body_html:
Yes it is a known issue. I need to fix it. If local=True it should invalidate though.

I also plan to indeed be able to declare invalidation on env variable. We have the internal machinery now.

body:
Yes it is a known issue. I need to fix it. If local=True it should invalidate though.

I also plan to indeed be able to declare invalidation on env variable. We have the internal machinery now.
